title: BRIEF-IDBI Bank Approves Divestment Of Stake In Asset Reconstruction Company (India) Ltd
text:
BRIEF-IDBI Bank Approves Divestment Of Stake In Asset Reconstruction Company (India) Ltd

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 17:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-IDBI Bank Approves Divestment Of Stake In Asset Reconstruction Company (India) Ltd Sept 27 (Reuters) - IDBI Bank Ltd : * DIVESTMENT OF IDBI BANK'S STAKE IN ASSET RECONSTRUCTION COMPANY (INDIA) LTD. (ARCIL) * BOARD GRANTED IN-PRINCIPLE APPROVAL TO DIVEST 19.18% OF ASSET RECONSTRUCTION COMPANY (INDIA) LTD.

BRIEF-IDBI Bank Approves Divestment Of Stake In Asset Reconstruction Company (India) Ltd
description: BRIEF-IDBI Bank Approves Divestment Of Stake In Asset Reconstruction Company (India) Ltd
